backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a dating app backend with profile management, match decisions, messaging between matched users, and photo posts with blob storage, using authorization mixins and access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old and new actor types for profiles and match decisions, with a run function that currently performs a no-op migration preserving existing data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: messaging interface, chat view, photo feed, photo posting, and navigation links, with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and functionality, including pages, components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a romantic color scheme using OKLCH color space for both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing, browse, matches, profile, messages, chat, and feed pages, plus profile setup modal logic.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Chat component displaying conversation history with a partner, showing sent/received messages chronologically, partner profile header, message input form, and auto-scroll functionality with read receipts.
frontend/src/components/CreatePostForm.t: Form component for creating photo posts with image upload, preview, caption input, and upload progress tracking. Validates file type and size, converts images to ExternalBlob, and uses the useCreatePhotoPost mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with header, navigation, and authentication controls. Provides responsive navigation for Browse, Matches, Messages, Feed, and Profile pages with Internet Identity login/logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/MatchCard.tsx: Displays a matched user's profile card with avatar, name, age, bio, and interests. Fetches profile data by Principal ID and shows loading state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCard.tsx: Swipeable profile card component for browsing potential matches with like/pass buttons. Includes animated transitions when making decisions and triggers the addMatchDecision mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing user profiles with fields for display name, age, bio, and interests. Validates input and uses the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation to persist changes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that displays the ProfileForm component for initial profile setup. Opens by default and closes on successful profile creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Initializes access control with admin token and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, providing login/logout functionality, identity state management, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend API calls including user profiles, matches, interests, messages, and photo posts with automatic cache invalidation and loading states.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors, including design tokens for backgrounds, borders, and component styling using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient provider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Profile browsing page that displays available profiles one at a time, filtering out already matched users and the current user, with loading states and empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Social feed page displaying photo posts from mutual matches sorted by timestamp, with create post dialog and empty states for users without matches.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, feature highlights, and call-to-action button that triggers Internet Identity login or navigates to browse page for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/MatchesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of user profiles that the current user has liked, with authentication checks and empty state prompting users to browse profiles.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Shows a list of conversations with matched users, displaying profile info, last message preview, and unread counts, with navigation to individual chat views.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Renders a profile creation or editing form for authenticated users, with loading states and authentication redirects.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, including rose and pink gradients for the dating app theme, plus typography and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting completed features for a dating app including profile management, browsing, matching, messaging, and photo feed functionality.
